personalInfo.name: Elangoraj Thiruppandiaraj
personalInfo.title: AI/ ML Leader | Document AI & GenAI | MSc Artificial Intelligence

summary: AI Leader with 10 years of experience delivering production-grade ML and Generative AI solutions in highly regulated environments (financial services and enterprise risk domains). Deep experience in Document AI, including OCR, intelligent document processing, semantic retrieval, and LLM-based reasoning over structured and unstructured enterprise documents. Strong background in model development, evaluation, and validation, with hands-on experience across LLMs, semantic search, NLP, and computer vision. Ability to translate complex AI outputs into defensible, explainable insights for senior stakeholders, governance teams, and non-technical audiences.

Cloud Ecosystem: Azure (Azure Databricks, Azure ML, AI Foundry, Copilot Studio)
GCP (Vertex AI, BigQuery, Document AI, Looker)

achievements: Led applied AI initiatives in regulated financial services, delivering production-grade AI and Generative AI solutions aligned with governance, security, and business outcomes.

Designed and delivered enterprise GenAI capabilities across document intelligence, semantic search, and automated decision support, enabling teams to interact with complex information more efficiently.

Built a secure Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) solution using local Hugging Face models, combining OCR, embeddings, and private vector search to extract, retrieve, and reason over sensitive unstructured data in a privacy-preserving manner.

Developed a unified AI-powered text generation platform that enables multiple stakeholders to engage through a single interface, supporting diverse use cases and tones of voice, saving 100+ hours annually and reducing effort by approximately 85%.
Led the AI4U internal AI enablement initiative and ongoing AI learning sessions, supporting responsible AI adoption through knowledge sharing, internal consulting, and practical guidance.
Led the delivery of AI-powered products at enterprise scale, working at the intersection of data science, product strategy, and stakeholder engagement.

Designed and scaled a multilingual transformer-based semantic matching capability for skills and job normalisation, significantly improving matching quality while reducing reliance on third-party services.
Established MLOps practices using MLflow to support reliable model experimentation, versioning, and deployment across AI products.

Developed a computer vision model to classify satellite imagery into multiple land-use categories, applying deep learning techniques and production-oriented tooling to support scalable image analysis.
Led the delivery of a deep learning–based product recommendation solution for a global FMCG client, enabling more effective product distribution and improved on-shelf availability.
Owned the end-to-end data lifecycle, from data ingestion and transformation to analytics-ready datasets and business reporting.
Recognised for consistent technical excellence and leadership through multiple performance awards.
